title: Quickstart

description: Round-robin, random, weighted, performance, session, geo, composition, and hot-swaps.

title: Health Monitoring
description: Concrete HealthMonitor subclass showing eviction of failing proxies.

description: Store/retrieve proxies with JSON and SQLite backends using temp paths.

title: Browser Rendering
description: Guarded Playwright example for JS-heavy sources; prints guidance if deps missing.

title: TUI Demo
description: Launch the interactive terminal UI with demo proxies.

title: CLI Walkthrough
description: Typer CLI commands with safe defaults and examples for scripting.

description: Fast onboarding with a mocked proxied request.
